name: Spooky Ghost Game (amberlyb, Jdaf1221, DominicLincourt, mochalante)
name_original: Spooky Ghost Game (amberlyb, Jdaf1221, DominicLincourt, mochalante)
description:
Spooky Ghost Game

Ghosts are running rampant and terrorizing the community. Many heroes have tried valiantly to defend their people, but to no avail. No mortal weapon can defeat a ghost. One lone hero hears tell of a mythical Ghost Sword, the only weapon on Earth that can rid areas of ghosts. The hero begins their quest to find and retrieve the Ghost Sword so that they may keep their family safe. In doing so, they become the world’s first Ghostbuster.

Spooky Ghost Game is a short, first-person, adventure game by Legalize Marinara. 

Keyboard and controller compatible.
